description: Retrieves information about the specified server certificate stored in IAM. For more information about working with server certificates, see Working with server certificates in the IAM User Guide. This topic includes a list of Amazon Web Services services that can use the server certificates that you manage with IAM.

parameters.name: ServerCertificateName
parameters.description: The name of the server certificate you want to retrieve information about. This parameter allows (through its regex pattern) a string of characters consisting of upper and lowercase alphanumeric characters with no spaces. You can also include any of the following characters: _+=,.@-

nested_items.name: ServerCertificate
nested_items.description: A structure containing details about the server certificate.

nested_items.name: ServerCertificateMetadata
nested_items.description: The meta information of the server certificate, such as its name, path, ID, and ARN.

nested_items.name: Path
nested_items.description: The path to the server certificate. For more information about paths, see IAM identifiers in the IAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: ServerCertificateName
nested_items.description: The name that identifies the server certificate.

nested_items.name: ServerCertificateId
nested_items.description: The stable and unique string identifying the server certificate. For more information about IDs, see IAM identifiers in the IAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the server certificate. For more information about ARNs and how to use them in policies, see IAM identifiers in the IAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: UploadDate
nested_items.description: The date when the server certificate was uploaded.

nested_items.name: Expiration
nested_items.description: The date on which the certificate is set to expire.

nested_items.name: CertificateBody
nested_items.description: The contents of the public key certificate.

nested_items.name: CertificateChain
nested_items.description: The contents of the public key certificate chain.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A list of tags that are attached to the server certificate. For more information about tagging, see Tagging IAM resources in the IAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key name that can be used to look up or retrieve the associated value. For example, Department or Cost Center are common choices.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value associated with this tag. For example, tags with a key name of Department could have values such as Human Resources, Accounting, and Support. Tags with a key name of Cost Center might have values that consist of the number associated with the different cost centers in your company. Typically, many resources have tags with the same key name but with different values.
